entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:12 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
